sign1: ^Welcome to SIDRAT Apartments! They're smaller on the inside!
sign2: ^"Dr Ava Parker"... I didn't know she has a backdoor!
^That's the neighbour whose front door always leaks a lime scent into the communal hallway.
^I don't think I'll ever know. They went missing last winter and all the police found was traces of a large animal's fur on the floor.
^Wait, shut up, this isn't supposed to be a horror game!
elevator0: ^This is where the most advanced science takes place! I wish to one day work there, once I get my psychology degree.
^This isn't the time for sightseeing, we're on a top secret stealth mission!
uni: ^Is this where you go to study?
^Yes, once in a blue moon. I prefer working at home.
^How do you know the moon's colour if you live underground?
centre: ^That's where everyone is today, traffic must be horrendous!
^I think traffic would be the least of your problems in a Lava Bucket Challenge flash mob...
vaxx: ^Yes, of course - with the best 5G chip! I bragged about it to my classmates until someone got 6G and now they're cooler than me...
^Wow, so what do you think of the anti-chippers?
^I pity them. They must be working "hard not smart" in uni, without the AI research assistant in their heads.
alley: ^"Research Lab - path closed to unauthorised persons"
danger: ^"Waste disposal and cargo unload area - no unauthorised entry"
wc: ^Purple or yellow? What genders are those?
offices: ^Do you think there will be a security office here?
^This way seems more promising than any other door, so let's try it!
catgirllab: ^(The name "Dr Ava Parker" has been messily scribbled over and replaced with "Dr Jonathan Chen")
^I wonder what happened to the previous employee...
^THAT'S the part you're concerned about?! What the hell is a catgirl?!
caution: ^"Attention all employees! Due to a recent incident involving Nitrozest spillage and the loss of a fellow scientist, this hallway
^is now off-limits for emergency renovation. - Jon"
lab0: ^(There is a post-it note underneath that reads: "The food bows refill automatically. Do not fall for their lies. They are not
office1: ^(You peer through the window. The office is empty)
office2: ^(the word "Robot" has been scribbled out and replaced with "Catgirl")
^This is great news! Maybe our president will soon move on to giving humans rights too!
